titles.title: It's Amazing What Praising Can Do

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's amazing what praising can do.
Hallelujah, hallelujah.
It's amazing what praising can do.
Hallelujah.
I don't worry when things go wrong.
Jesus fills my heart with a song.
It's amazing what praising can do.
Hallelujah.
